name: Ultra LEDs
overview:
Ultraleds was founded in the year 1999 and has always specialised in LED products.

Unlike other lighting specialists, Ultraleds only deal in LED products and has over 10 years of LED experience.

Ultraleds stocks over 500 led unique led products including basic leds, automotive leds, household leds, marine leds , caravan led and led light tape which are available directly to the public as well as the trade .

Ultraleds specialises in bespoke lighting design for small to medium installations and aim to guide architects to electricians through the installation process.

Quantity discounts are available on most products on the website.
